titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to add Flagstaff and Yuma to the list of locations in which court shall be held in the judicial district for the State of Arizona.
A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to add Flagstaff and Yuma to the list of locations in which court shall be held in the judicial district for the State of Arizona.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill adds Flagstaff and Yuma to the list of locations where court must be held in the U.S. District of Arizona.
